message.content: I only want to install the Gemini MCP package

content.text: I'll help you add the Gemini MCP package to your project. Let's try running the command correctly:

input.description: Add Gemini MCP with API key

input.command: claude mcp add gemini -s user --env GOOGLE_API_KEY=AIzaSyC0qvYLKzyelX0SNDGaLi6VVtrG9QJvKYE -- npx -y @anthropic-ai/mcp-gemini
input.description: Add Gemini MCP with API key and correct package

content.content: Added stdio MCP server gemini with command: npx -y @anthropic-ai/mcp-gemini to user config

toolUseResult.stdout: Added stdio MCP server gemini with command: npx -y @anthropic-ai/mcp-gemini to user config

content.text: The Gemini MCP package has been successfully added to your Claude configuration.
